body:
Comment 4 by **magnus.leuthner**: 
Hey everyone,

just wanted to let you know I'm experiencing a similar test failure as well (current
release checkout) on a FreeBSD virtual machine (386). The machine is not under load,
however it is quite weak (384 MB of RAM, god knows how slow the share of CPU power I get
is). 

Maybe turning this into a warning would help?

Thanks
Magnus
